mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_trade_account (userId, accountNo, balance, tradeGroupId, activeTime, status, institutionTypeId, institutionId, companyId, userName, tradeGroupName) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{institutionTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institutionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT id, userId, accountNo, balance, tradeGroupId, activeTime, status, institutionTypeId, institutionId, companyId, userName, tradeGroupName FROM t_trade_account WHERE accountNo = #{accountNo}
